nsfilerepo-upload-target: The respective field holds the name of the file in the target namespace, i.e. the prefix of the file name is being appended to the target file name, e.g. "Project:My file.png"
nsfilerepo-nsmain:
Label for selectbox option to upload into main namespace
{{Identical|Main}}
nsfilerepo-reupload-namespaceselector-di: Info text for a namespace select field on [[Special:Upload]] in case it is a reupload
nsfilerepo-move-file-namespace-action-la: Label for a content action on a file description page
nsfilerepo-move-file-namespace-dialog-ti: Title of a dialog that let's tha user change the file namespace association
nsfilerepo-move-file-namespace-dialog-bu: Label for a dialog button to confirm {{Identical|upload-dialog-button-done}}
Label for a dialog button to cancel {{Identical|Cancel}}
nsfilerepo-move-file-namespace-dialog-na:
Label for input field to choose a namespace from
{{Identical|Namespace}}
nsfilerepo-upload-file-namespace-namespa:
Label for input field to choose a namespace from
{{Identical|Namespace}}
